trans-unit.source: Specifies the type of registration to perform for a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> or <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> registration.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o tipo de registro a ser executado para uma registro <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />.

trans-unit.source: Registering an <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> enables it to receive <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> invitation requests.
trans-unit.target: Registrando um <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> permite que ele receba <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> solicitações de convite.

trans-unit.source: The service or application performing the registration must have permission to do so, as it requires access to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> and other resources like users, applications, and services on the remote machine.
trans-unit.target: O serviço ou aplicativo que executa o registro deve ter permissão para fazer isso, como ele requer acesso para o <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ContactManager> e outros recursos, como usuários, aplicativos e serviços no computador remoto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> or <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> is being registered for all peers of the application host
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication" /> ou o <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> está sendo registrado para todos os pares do host de aplicativo

trans-unit.source: The application or object is being registered only for the user associated with the calling peer
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo ou o objeto está sendo registrado apenas para o usuário associado ao par de chamada
